document.full_text: a suicide bomber in an afghan army uniform killed five foreign and four afghan soldiers on saturday at a sprawling desert base in the east of the country, the highest toll on nato-led troops in a single attack for several months.
document.title: suicide attack kills 5 foreign soldiers in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomber in an afghan army uniform killed five foreign and four afghan soldiers on saturday at a sprawling desert base in the east of the country, the highest toll on nato-led troops in a single attack for several months.
